apis.name: Repository files API
apis.description: You can fetch, create, update, and delete files in your repository with this API. You can also configure rate limits for this API.

apis.name: Available scopes for personal access tokens
apis.description: The different scopes available using personal access tokens are depicted in the following table.

attributes.name: read_repository
attributes.type: Allows read-access to the repository files.

attributes.name: api
attributes.type: Allows read-write access to the repository files.

apis.name: Get file from repository
apis.description: In addition to the GET method, you can also use HEAD to get just file metadata.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: file_path
attributes.description: URL encoded full path to new file. Ex. lib%2Fclass%2Erb.

attributes.name: ref
attributes.description: The name of branch, tag or commit

apis.name: Get file blame from repository
apis.description: Allows you to receive blame information. Each blame range contains lines and corresponding commit information.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: file_path
attributes.description: URL encoded full path to new file. Ex. lib%2Fclass%2Erb.

attributes.name: ref
attributes.description: The name of branch, tag or commit

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: file_path
attributes.description: URL encoded full path to new file. Ex. lib%2Fclass%2Erb.

attributes.name: ref
attributes.description: The name of branch, tag or commit. Default is the HEAD of the project.

apis.name: Create new file in repository
apis.description: This allows you to create a single file. For creating multiple files with a single request see the commits API.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: file_path
attributes.description: URL-encoded full path to new file. For example: lib%2Fclass%2Erb.

attributes.name: branch
attributes.description: Name of the new branch to create. The commit is added to this branch.

attributes.name: start_branch
attributes.description: Name of the base branch to create the new branch from.

attributes.name: encoding
attributes.description: Change encoding to base64. Default is text.

attributes.name: author_email
attributes.description: The commit author’s email address.

attributes.name: author_name
attributes.description: The commit author’s name.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: The file’s content.

attributes.name: commit_message
attributes.description: The commit message.

apis.name: Update existing file in repository
apis.description: GitLab Shell has a boolean return code, preventing GitLab from specifying the error.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: file_path
attributes.description: URL-encoded full path to new file. For example: lib%2Fclass%2Erb.

attributes.name: branch
attributes.description: Name of the new branch to create. The commit is added to this branch.

attributes.name: start_branch
attributes.description: Name of the base branch to create the new branch from.

attributes.name: encoding
attributes.description: Change encoding to base64. Default is text.

attributes.name: author_email
attributes.description: The commit author’s email address.

attributes.name: author_name
attributes.description: The commit author’s name.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: The file’s content.

attributes.name: commit_message
attributes.description: The commit message.

attributes.name: last_commit_id
attributes.description: Last known file commit ID.

apis.name: Delete existing file in repository
apis.description: This allows you to delete a single file. For deleting multiple files with a single request, see the commits API.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: file_path
attributes.description: URL-encoded full path to new file. For example: lib%2Fclass%2Erb.

attributes.name: branch
attributes.description: Name of the new branch to create. The commit is added to this branch.

attributes.name: start_branch
attributes.description: Name of the base branch to create the new branch from.

attributes.name: author_email
attributes.description: The commit author’s email address.

attributes.name: author_name
attributes.description: The commit author’s name.

attributes.name: commit_message
attributes.description: The commit message.

attributes.name: last_commit_id
attributes.description: Last known file commit ID.
